diagnosis.final_diagnosis: Aggressive B-cell non-Hodgkin’s lymphoma of the right atrium, probably diffuse large-B-cell lymphoma.
diagnosis.diagnostic_reasoning: The presence of a large right atrial mass, combined with high lactate dehydrogenase levels, rapid disease progression, and the patient's HIV-positive status, strongly suggested lymphoma. The biopsy revealed a dense infiltrate of large atypical lymphoid cells consistent with diffuse large-B-cell lymphoma, particularly EBV-positive.
